description: Modifies the configuration of the multi-auth plugin. Each command should be wrapped in a single key object that identifies the scheme. The embedded command is then passed to the scheme specific plugin.

set-user.description: The set-user command allows you to add users and change their passwords. Usernames and passwords are expressed as key-value pairs in a JSON object.

delete-user.description: Delete a user or a list of users. Passwords do not need to be provided, simply list the users in a JSON array, separated by colons.

set-property.description: The set-property command lets you set any of the configuration parameters supported by this plugin
